This code plots the parameter estimates for the top models predicting bleaching probablity from historical environmental variables. Lines indicator 95% confidence intervals; filled circles represent variables with 95% confidence intervals that do not cross zero (dashed line).

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.width = 6, fig.height=3.5}
d <- read.csv("parameter_estimates_27July2015.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE) 

#remove intercept
#remove trend SST with large std err. 
d2 <- d[-c(1,7),]

ggplot(aes(x = reorder(label, -estimate, mean), y = estimate), data = d2) + 
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = lower_ci, ymax = upper_ci), size = 0.75, width = 0) + 
  geom_point(aes(fill =  as.factor(sig)), shape = 21, size = 4) +
  coord_flip() +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("white","black")) + 
  theme_bw(base_size = 16) + 
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype = "dashed", size = 0.25) + 
  scale_y_continuous("Multimodel averaged coefficient") +
  theme(legend.position="none", axis.title.y = element_blank(), axis.title.x = element_text(size = 13))

ggsave("parameter-averaged coefficients_27July2015.pdf", width=6, height=3.5, dpi=300)

```
